fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Differential Track Rate in RA, in addition to the planet's inherent tracking rate
fields.name: dRA

fields.doc: Differential Track Rate in Declination , in addition to the planet's inherent tracking rate
fields.name: dDec

fields.doc: Desired instrument position angle, Eastwards from North
fields.name: rotPA
